description:
Ringo, Leila, and Natsuki are at the department store. They came to see Wish’s giant poster. The Ma-pets Sei, Dai, and Ryoku are apparently in awe during their first visit to a department store. But suddenly Ryoku cries out! When everybody turns around, they see an energetic boy waving Ryoku around by his tail! Natsuki rushes to safe Ryoku. The boy’s name is Hayata, and it looks like he is lost. Since they can’t find his mother in the vicinity, the girls take him to the Lost Children Center. But when they try to give him up, they realize that he has disappeared again…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost and in Big Trouble! Pri!
まいごで大さわぎ☆ぷりっ!
